about_the_game:
LIMITED TIME SAVINGS

❗️❗️❗️Don't miss out on the cosmic adventure! Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure is launching at a discount for a limited time during the Steam Winter Sale. Grab your controllers and defy the odds in this pixelated space odyssey!


Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure is an award-winning 3rd person local co-op arcade shooter, channeling the spirit of classic shoot-em-ups.

STORY


(=^･ω･^=) (=^･ω･^=)
Two cats are on a space vacation until... they are not. Thrown into an unexpected space adventure, they are faced with perculiar monsters that are out for cat blood.

Help the cats defeat the strange bosses and save their vacation!

GAMEPLAY


🎮 A Dual-Pilot Odyssey

(=^･ω･^=) Take control of two pilot cats controlling Capsule Cat, our adorable voxel robot hero. Armed with a cutting-edge energy pack, guide Capsule Cat through stages filled with blocky alien adversaries.

🤝 The Test of Teamwork

Working together is essential, and squabbling is part of the action! Customise your characters but maybe don't fight over it, your friendship still awaits 10 stages of projectile assaults...

💥 Battle Onward!

Engage in thrilling battles against aliens armed with tough shields, projectiles, spikes, and giant lasers. How far can you progress before Capsule Cat faces the ultimate showdown?
✴••• ✴••• 一==≡눈٩(^･ω･^)ง

🛍 Upgrades: Is the best defense really a good offense?

Between stages, take a breather and enhance your stats at the shop. Experience the excitement of rolling for random upgrades, hoping to land the enhancements that fit right into your strategy.
ヾ(☆▽☆)

🌌 Unpredictable Adventures Await

Enjoy unique playthroughs every time, no two playthroughs are alike!

short_description: Grab a friend and blast your way through Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure! Assemble the perfect robot. Slay strange aliens. Narrowly weave through barrages of bullets, lasers and ...tentacles? Test your teamwork with this heart-pumping teeth-clenching action-packed odyssey!
